text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, [hangome ki az pajomʙar ʙaroi darki ojoti Qur'on darxosti muhlat mekuned] nagūed: "Ro'ino" [Zero ta'ʙiri mazkur ilova ʙar ma'noi aslī mafhumi tavhinomeze hamguni "nodonī"-ro ʙa zehn merasonad], ʙalki ʙigūed: "Unzurno" [kame ʙa mo fursat ʙideh] va [on goh ʙa ojoti Qur'on] gūş kuned va [jaqin ʙidoned, ki] kofiron [va tamasxurkunandagoni pajomʙar] azoʙi dardnok [dar peş] dorand
